name: BOTTOM UP BEATDOWN: REBUILD RETRIBUTION (DEMO)
description:
BOTTOM UP BEATDOWN: REBUILD RETRIBUTION (AKA BUBRR) is a boss rush game in a 2D beat em' up style. Play as Steaks, a shark-man as you battle your way through the Mask Tournament.

The game's only about 10 minutes in length with three bosses, and it's still pretty early in development. I'm mainly just looking for feedback on the gameplay, so please criticize!
